title: Utilizing LMS in Sustainable Educational Environments: Elementary Mathematics Collaborative Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental math concepts and ability to use LMS basic features
context.additional_context: A mobile-based flexible learning environment for working adult learners, emphasizing consideration of individual learning paces and team project-centered collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously complete five or more microlearning modules per week using an LMS.
Learners can complete two team-based math problem-solving projects using collaboration tools within the LMS.
Learners can identify their learning patterns and adjust learning strategies through LMS analytics tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
